technologies.rustDescription: I really enjoy working with Rust in my free time. I'm constantly impressed by the language's thorough design, and hope to one day utilize it in my day job.
technologies.webDescription: I have by far the most experience with web technologies. Although I have a fixed stack that I prefer, I started with vanilla JS and climbed my way up to meta-frameworks.
technologies.toolingDescription: I use git and conventional commits on all my projects, daily-drive neovim for school stuff, and have fought with docker for a good number of hours.
